ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: SWG
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Star Wars Galaxies. And I have to say, this is the first place I have even heard people happy about it.... myself, I m glad I got to beta it, because I
ygData.messageBody:
> Gotta ask. What is SWG?

Star Wars Galaxies. And I have to say, this is the first place I have even
heard people happy about it.... myself, I'm glad I got to beta it, because I
would have sure been ticked off if I had paid all that money for it! And I
waited for that game for years. What a disappointment. When I went to get my
pre-order deposit back, the manager said that they had been giving a
whooooole lot of deposits back...

Guess I'll just wait for EQII. :-)

~Kyndara Silverleaf~
Pathfinder of Karana,
Firiona Vie
<Circle of Sisters>
